description: 3rd ranked Dragon takes on newcomer The Sadist. The Sadist (Clair Adams) is in real life one of the meanest, cruelest, and creative Mistresses we have ever come across. I don't think she even feels pain, if she does, it feels good to her. She is tough and very intelligent. Never underestimate intelligence; it can be almost as valuable as experience on the mat. One thing I have learned at US, never take anything for granted, the second you do…..
title: The Dragon (18-5) Ranked 3rd
